title: Go Epic with Thule - Chris Van Dine
description:
Show us your passion for biking and you have the chance to win a trip to hang out with Thule Crew member and freeriding mountain biker Chris Van Dine! 

Upload your best video now and join the competition!
www.epicthule.com

The competition runs from September 30 to December 9, 2013.
_______________

World famous freeriding mountain biker Chris Van Dine developed a taste for speed at an early age and won his first mountain bike race when he was eight. Confronted with the realities of the developing world, Chris realized that his passion and experience could actually impact peoples' lives on a basic level. From that point, his mission became one of ambassadorship and philanthropy.

Learn more about Chris Van Dine:
http://www.thule.com/thulecrew
